title: Boil Water Notice
bodyMarkdown:
Out of an abundance of caution, please boil water for drinking and cooking until further notice. Local water authority is performing testing after maintenance work on the main line.

**What to do:**
- Boil water for 1 minute before use
- Affects drinking, cooking, ice making
- Brushing teeth should also use boiled water

We will update you as soon as the all-clear is given.

title: Thanksgiving Week Closures
bodyMarkdown:
Our office will be closed Thursday, November 28 and Friday, November 29 for Thanksgiving.

**Emergency contact:** For urgent maintenance issues during the holiday, call our emergency line at (555) 123-4567.

title: Winter Weather Preparation
bodyMarkdown:
As winter approaches, please remember:
- Let faucets drip during freezing temperatures
- Keep cabinet doors open under sinks
- Maintain heat above 55Â°F even when away
- Report any drafts or heating issues promptly
